decision_conditions: By reason of the design, layout and location, the proposed residential units would have restricted access to natural light and the application has failed to demonstrate that an appropriate level of internal natural light would be achieved for future occupiers. As such, prior approval is required and refused under Condition MA.2.(1)(2)(f) of Sch. 2. Part 3. Class MA of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). | The proposal lacks detail on the provision of cycle parking. As such, prior approval is required and refused under Condition MA.2.(1)(2)(a) of Sch. 2. Part 3. Class MA of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
description: Change of use of first floor commercial space (Use Class E) into 2 self-contained residential unit (Use Class C3) (Class MA, 56 Day Prior Approval Process)
